Attract multinationals with ease like Toba

My job was one of the things that took a hit during the pandemic. I was devastated by this but a respected senior friend convinced me to go and improve my skills at PDMA so I'd be indispensable. He wasn't wrong. In 4 short weeks, the improvement was so obvious and profound that Lagos Business School approached me. In a very short while, using what I learned at PDMA, I did not just land a job, I rose to Manager ranks at Lagos Business School. Looking back, I am glad the last job ended...but I am most glad I went to PDMA.

Toba Olugosi -
Client Relationship Manager, Lagos Business School
Enroll Now

Industry Partnerships

Benefit from our collaborations with leading companies, participating in the training of their workforce. Many of our alumni have secured positions with these esteemed partners, marking the beginning of successful careers.

About Us

Welcome to PDMA

Where we strive to bring visions to life – one business, one individual at a time.

PDMA is more than just a training institute; we are your gateway to mastering and monetizing Digital and Tech skills. Our mission is clear: empower businesses and individuals to achieve their goals by harnessing the transformative power of digital and tech education.

Read more about us

Discover the right learning experience for you

Browse through our digital and tech programs curated and taught by global industry experts

  • Get skilled in Digital Marketing, Design, and Tech
  • Go through ‘use cases’ to have a proper grasp of your modules
  • Work on live projects to put your knowledge to the test
  • Build a robust portfolio with our internship partners
View Our Programs

All courses include Projects, Globally accredited certifications, Internships, and a Free PDMA membership.

Explore Your Learning Options

Flexible Delivery Methods for Your Convenience

Embark on your learning journey with us and tailor your experience to suit your preferences and unique circumstances. Our programs offer diverse delivery modes, ensuring that you have the flexibility to choose the learning style that best fits your needs.

Physical Classes

Undergo our digital marketing training program, and enjoy your journey towards success with like-minded course mates live at our physical campus.

Online Classes

Our online training program, which includes virtual and E-learning, offers the flexibility of studying completely online, on the go, at your own pace, and from the comfort of your home!

Corporate

Ramp up your digital and tech team for business success. Our corporate training program offers the flexibility of customising our training schedules and location to fit your team.

Our process - VISION

At PDMA, our meticulously crafted process is designed to empower you to extract the utmost value from our programs. We are committed to guiding you through each step of your transformative journey.

Vision boarding

We try as much as possible to get a clear picture of where you are going and what you desire to achieve. Then we map out a way for you to get there.

In-depth Learning

We take you through courses and programs curated and taught by global experts to start you on your journey to actualising your vision. Your learning comes packed with assignments and assessments to speed up the learning process.

Strategy and ideation

~ Strategy and ideation ~ Take part in strategy, creative, and ideation sessions designed to test your understanding and grasp of what you’ve learned. Put on your thinking hat, and create solutions for businesses.

Implementation

We put all you've learned to the test. Work on group and individual projects that take you closer to your goal. At the end of your program and project assessments, you will be issued a globally recognised certificate from our U.S. partners.

Opportunities

During and after completing our program, we assist in getting you access to job and internship opportunities. We have a network of companies we partner with to make these opportunities readily available.
As a firm looking to boost your team through talent recruitment, we have a pool of rock-solid talents ready to contribute to your organisational goals.

Native

Become a part of our clan. As a clan member, you enjoy the opportunities that come from having a supportive community of passionate entrepreneurs and talents.

Monthly webinars to keep up with updates on several digital and tech

Yearly events for networking

Access to our business networks and partners

Why Learn A Digital And Tech Skill From Us

My job was one of the things that took a hit during the pandemic. I was devastated by this but a respected senior friend convinced me to go and improve my skills at PDMA so I'd be indispensable. He wasn't wrong. In 4 short weeks, the improvement was so obvious and profound that Lagos Business School approached me. In a very short while, using what I learned at PDMA, I did not just land a job, I rose to Manager ranks at Lagos Business School. Looking back, I am glad the last job ended...but I am most glad I went to PDMA.

Toba Olugosi Client Relationship Manager, Lagos Business School

PDMA
MY BUSINESS BLEW AT PDMA!

A few weeks into my training, the instructors kept insisting we tried out what we had learned. So, I used one of the sales strategies we were taught alongside a sales copy we were given... and BOOM! Millions of naira in a matter of weeks in my business. I could not believe it, especially since I initially thought they were just talking story at PDMA. I am still reaping the benefits of enrolling at PDMA.

MRS BAMIDELE CEO, NAILSCOPE

PDMA
I AM DOING WELL!

I loved marketing, the only problem was I didn't know how to do it. I knew I had to start from somewhere and I am glad I started from PDMA. PDMA started from the basics of marketing before we went into digital marketing and that was my eureka moment. I would have just known the tools and been totally clueless about converting customers. Today, I am the lead strategist for several multination brands and I can't even lie, PDMA laid the foundation for this career I am enjoying today.

Ben Ikade Brand Manager, PESS

PDMA
PDMA BUILT MY CAREER!

I was a corper when I enrolled at PDMA. At that point of my life, I was at a career crossroads and quite skeptical about PDMA. I am glad I was wrong because within 4 weeks I learnt a lot about digital marketing, enough to chart my career path and launch a successful freelance career aside from my 9-5 as a copywriter at an advertising agency. Thanks to PDMA, my targeting is always on point meaning that my campaign and messaging are successful and yield the desired results always. I feel like I can't fail in marketing ever again. The best thing PDMA did for me was beyond knowledge, because I built a network of valuable professionals who have helped me to stand on my feet in just a matter of weeks.

Precious Ahamefula Brand Manager, PESS

After graduating from University, I knew needed digital skills if this economy was going to favor me. It didn’t take long to find PDMA, and I am glad I did. My experience at PDMA positioned me to land a job right after my graduation where I manage local international brands…it didn’t even take time to happen. I am really happy cos truly when you weigh it against the value you get, PDMA is just doing giveaways to help people like me get their lives started. PDMA Should Charge More

Ifeoluwa Israel Content Writer, PESS

ARE YOU SEEKING TO RELOCATE BUT WANT TO LEARN A HIGH-IN-DEMAND SKILL TO INCREASE YOUR JOB OPTIONS BEFORE EMBARKING ON YOUR JOURNEY?

WE‘VE GOT YOU!

Owing to the digital disruption that has happened in the last few years {with the rise of the internet and social media}, lots of companies have had to adapt to meet up with current consumer demands, with a lot of commercial activities now taking place online. 

However, in order to meet this demand, stay competitive and remain relevant, they need personnel with digital and tech skills. This demand is ever-growing.

So it is your interest to learn transferable, in-demand skills you can use anywhere in the world. 

Relocational Testimonial

Frequently Asked Questions

WHAT IS DIGITAL MARKETING?

Digital marketing means using the internet and digital tools to promote products, services, and brands. It's about getting more people to know about a business and trust it by sharing ads and helpful content to bring in new customers and keep the current ones happy.

HOW MUCH DOES DIGITAL MARKETING TRAINING COST IN LAGOS?

Digital marketing courses are reasonably priced, and the cost may differ depending on the institute. With a budget ranging from 150,000 to 300,000, you can acquire valuable digital marketing skills.

WHAT IF I AM NOT CLOSE TO THE VENUE OF THE TRAINING?

If you live far from the training location and can't come to class regularly, you can use our online platform. It lets you learn at your own speed and convenience. Visit pdmaonline.com to learn more about our digital marketing courses online.

WHICH CERTIFICATION IS THE BEST?

There are several good certifications for digital marketing, including:Premium Digital Marketing Academy Certification, Facebook Blueprint Certification, Google Analytics IQ Certification, Hootsuite Social Marketing Certification, Google Ads Certification, Zeo Digital Academy, Chartered Institute of Social Media Marketing and Digital Marketing, etc. 

WHAT DIGITAL MARKETING TRAINING DOES PDMA OFFER?

PDMA offers several digital marketing training programs, including in-class training, corporate training, and online training.

HOW MUCH DOES DIGITAL MARKETING TRAINING COST IN NIGERIA?

The cost of a digital marketing course in Nigeria can vary depending on the academy, but you should budget between 100,000 to 300,000 Naira.

CAN THE PAYMENTS BE DONE IN INSTALLMENTS FOR YOUR DIGITAL MARKETING COURSE?

Yes, you can make payments in installments for our digital marketing course, but the full payment should be completed before the class ends.

IS THERE A CERTIFICATE AT THE END OF THE DIGITAL MARKETING PROGRAM?

Yes. Upon completion of the digital marketing training, you will receive a certificate. Additionally, PDMA will guide you on how to obtain certifications from Google, HubSpot, and other relevant international digital marketing certification bodies

Our training programs include: In-class training, Corporate training, and Online training



WHAT DOES A DIGITAL MARKETING COURSE COST IN NIGERIA?

The cost of a digital marketing course can vary depending on the academy. In Nigeria, you should budget between 100,000 to 300,000 Naira.

CAN I PAY FOR YOUR DIGITAL MARKETING COURSE IN INSTALLMENTS?

Yes, you can pay in installments, but please ensure full payment is made before the class ends.

DO I RECEIVE A CERTIFICATE AFTER COMPLETING THE DIGITAL MARKETING TRAINING?

Absolutely, you'll receive a certificate once you finish the course, including all assignments and projects. We'll even assist you in obtaining certifications from Google, HubSpot, and other important international digital marketing bodies.

WHAT DIGITAL MARKETING COURSES ARE INCLUDED IN THE PROGRAM?

Our curriculum covers a wide range of courses, including: Online Marketing Strategy, Lead Generation, Sales Conversion, and Website Credibility, Web Design (WordPress),  Email Marketing, Fundamentals of Graphic Design, Google Analytics, Content Marketing/Copywriting, Social Media Marketing, Search Engine Optimization (SEO), and Search Engine Marketing (SEM).

ARE THESE DIGITAL MARKETING COURSES INCLUDED IN THE PACKAGE?

Yes. When you enroll, you'll receive training in all these courses. However, if you prefer to specialize in just one or a few of these courses, we offer customized packages to meet your specific needs.
